resources.string: Swipe left to flick through your feeds.
Enter the name of your band
Select 3 genres that best describe your band"\n""\n"1st genre
How many members are in your band?
Which county is your band based in? Bands must come from the UK!
Which town is your band based in?
Enter your website address"\n"(if you have one)
Click to select a band logo or photo for your band
Enter a webpage that contains samples of your music e.g. your SoundCloud page"\n"(if you have one)
Which member of the band is you?
Author: Brett Flitter"\n"Version: Prototype 1 – 20/02/2013"\n"Title: Project bandFeed

"
"Welcome to bandFeed!"
" bandFeed is a final year computer science project developed by Brett Flitter. It is still very much in prototype form and will be buggy!"
""
" The purpose of this project is to create a publish/subscribe Android App which allows users to selectively subscribe to UK based bands’ news and messages. Using an AMQP message broker, bands are able to send messages out to their subscribers in an asynchronous manner. There is no two-way conversation functionality in this App, you should address all the people who wish to hear what your band has got to say."
""
" Feel free to create real or example/test/fake band profiles to discover the app’s full functionality."
""
" Some instructions/explainations you might need along the way:"
""
" Users can be linked to many bands. If you’re a member of an existing profile, LONG PRESS over the member section of a profile to send a link request!"
""
" All members of a band can send out messages to their followers providing they’re linked to the band profile. The option to send messages will appear once you’ve had your link request accepted."
""
" Profiles can be edited or deleted, just LONG PRESS on any of the sections on your band profile."
""
" A small amount of messages and images are cached to your phone to enable faster browsing speeds when reading through your feeds."
""
"
Enter one or more search criteria"\n"(You may leave fields blank)
Send a message to your subscribers
Message to be sent from which band?
Select the topic type of your message
*** DISCLAIMER - Any data submitted cannot be gauaranteed safety. You should choose a unique password different from any other services you may use. ***"\n""\n"Please create a username for yourself
Enter up to 3 of your favourite music genres. These will be used to make band recommendations based on what you like."\n""\n"1st genre
All constructive feedback will be greatly apprieciated and will help me to produce a better app. Please use this service to also submit any bugs you may come across.
Please state the device you\'re using e.g \'Samsung Galaxy S3\'.
Please state the version of Android you\'re running e.g. \'4.0.3\'. \n If you are not sure you can find the android version located in \'Settings\' > \'About phone\' > \'Android version\'.
If the comment you wish to make was in releation to the page in which you pressed the \'Send Feedback\' icon (the previous page), please tick the following box, otherwise just leave it blank.
Yes the comment is releated to the previous page.
Enter the name of band member
Enter the role(s) of member e.g. Bassist, Vocalist
